text: ukraine needs help it has done for
months as russia sent more and more
troops to the border ukraine was
receiving more and more military aid
from the west overall the u.s has given
two and a half billion dollars worth
since 2014 and as ukraine's military has
doubled in size it's been fighting too
against separatists in eastern ukraine
but thursday night brought something new
and faced with russia's invasion ukraine
needs more help that won't be troops as
president biden has made clear we have
no intention of fighting russia but this
weekend the west escalated its military
support first the americans released a
further 350 million dollars other
countries offered more too the uk france
poland turkey belgium and crucially
germany
with the invasion of ukraine we have
entered a new era
since the second world war germany
hasn't sent weapons into conflict zones
not anymore the new chancellor olaf
schultz tweeted we are delivering a
thousand anti-tank weapons and 500
stinger missiles to our friends in
ukraine he told germans there was no
other choice and the list of weaponry
continues to expand javelin anti-tank
guided missiles from the uk the us and
estonia drones from turkey and germany's
policy ship means countries which have
german-made weapons can share those too
the extra supports been noted on friday
president zielenski said ukraine was
being left alone but on saturday night
he tweeted keep it up chancellor schultz
the anti-war coalition in action there
is though a challenge here getting
military aid into ukraine is more
complicated now for example flying
weapons in poses an unacceptable risk
anti-tank anti-aircraft systems that can
be trucked across the border picked up
by the ukrainians
the vital problem then is to get the
start in in the volume that's needed as
quickly as possible but then of course
for the ukrainian forces to be able to
distribute them to the battlefronts
where they're actually needed and so
putin's invasion is being resisted by
ukrainians with western weapons it can't
be known if that will be enough
you
